name: markasset
description: Streamline adding images to markdown documents with upload codes

markasset.googleClientId.description: Google OAuth 2.0 Client ID (Desktop app type)

markasset.googleClientSecret.description: Google OAuth 2.0 Client Secret (Desktop app type â€” not truly secret, required by Google's API)

markasset.pollInterval.description: Poll interval in milliseconds for checking uploaded files

markasset.downloadPaths.markdownDescription: Custom download folder paths. Supports `${workspaceFolder}` and `${fileDirname}` variables. When set, replaces the default paths (`${workspaceFolder}/images` and `${fileDirname}/images`). Paths must be absolute (use variables, not relative paths like `./images`).
